airtrafficcontrol.app.utils

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • airtrafficcontrol.app.utils.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Class whose instances are databases of airships.

    Implementation notes

    • We privileged the action of accessing an airship from the database, using its flightID, and the feature of not allowing storage of airships with the same flightID; as so, the data structure used is a Map.
    • As no order between the planes is privileged, it's used a HashMap.
    • When needed, an iterator is created to iterate over the HashMap's entries.

    Author:
    Eva Gomes, Hugo Leal, Lucas Andrade

      • addDatabase

        public java.lang.String addDatabase(Database newData)
        Adds the entries stored in newData into this.
        Parameters:
        newData - The database whose entries are to be added to this.
        Returns:
        The message "All airplanes were added successfully." if so; a message containing which entries are already part of this and were not added again.
